message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I think you'd be interested in. It's worth a lot to me, so I'm asking for $15000. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product! While $12000 is a good offer, I'm hoping for something closer to $14000 to make this work. This unique product is worth a lot to me, and I believe its value will exceed your expectations.  What do you think?
I understand that the product is unique, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $14000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $13500. Can you consider that?
